about_the_game:
Customize your Aliens: Fireteam Elite experience with the following items for your marine:
  • 7 Weyland-Yutani Kit Skins
  • 7 Weyland-Yutani Spec Ops Kit Skins
  • Weyland-Yutani Surface Expedition Cap
  • Weyland-Yutani Cap
  • Weyland-Yutani EVA Helmet
  • Weyland-Yutani EVA SpecOps Helmet
  • Weyland-Yutani Operative Weapon Color
  • Weyland-Yutani Executive Weapon Color
  • Geode Blue Weapon Color
  • Marble Black Gold Weapon Color
  • Nostromo Wings Weapon Decal
  • "There They Are" Weapon Decal
  • Worn Wey Yu Sticker Weapon Decal
  • Building Better Worlds Weapon Decal
  • Air Guitar Emote
  • Double Thumbs Up Emote
  • Metal Emote
  • Finger Guns Emote
  • 3 Random Challenge Cards, 3 Random Consumables
  • Bonus bundle of Requisition Credits and Rep Scrip

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
Special Offer

Included FREE with the Aliens: Fireteam Elite DELUXE EDITION or available for individual purchase


About the Game

Customize your Aliens: Fireteam Elite experience with the following items for your marine:
  • 7 Weyland-Yutani Kit Skins
  • 7 Weyland-Yutani Spec Ops Kit Skins
  • Weyland-Yutani Surface Expedition Cap
  • Weyland-Yutani Cap
  • Weyland-Yutani EVA Helmet
  • Weyland-Yutani EVA SpecOps Helmet
  • Weyland-Yutani Operative Weapon Color
  • Weyland-Yutani Executive Weapon Color
  • Geode Blue Weapon Color
  • Marble Black Gold Weapon Color
  • Nostromo Wings Weapon Decal
  • "There They Are" Weapon Decal
  • Worn Wey Yu Sticker Weapon Decal
  • Building Better Worlds Weapon Decal
  • Air Guitar Emote
  • Double Thumbs Up Emote
  • Metal Emote
  • Finger Guns Emote
  • 3 Random Challenge Cards, 3 Random Consumables
  • Bonus bundle of Requisition Credits and Rep Scrip

short_description: Customize your Aliens: Fireteam Elite experience with a pack of over 25 items, including class kit skins, weapon colors, head accessories, emotes and more!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Czech, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
